author: Jerene Watson
text: We have begun to explore a Town & Gown program in partnership with our university.  I am interested in what structure you have found successful, mission statements and creative collaboration in setting up such a group.  Details of your program (who sits on the committee or working group, frequency of meetings, what challenges they approach, who among the neighborhood and business groups are involved, etc.).  Email:  jerenewatson@flagstaffaz.gov; 928-213-2073.  Thank you!
title: Town & Gown Working Groups
